subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Colsaerts’s road to the Ryder Cup was not a straight shot. He qualified for the European Tour at 18, then dropped to 1,305th in the world before becoming the first Belgian to qualify for this week’s tournament.
snippet: Nicolas Colsaerts’s road to the Ryder Cup was not a straight shot. He qualified for the European Tour at 18, then dropped to 1,305th in the world before becoming the first Belgian to qualify for this week’s tournament.
